duties_responsibilities.duty: Generating proposals, preparing sales quotations, and delivering presentations for Cardiovascular Ultrasound (CVUS) products.
Maintaining and building after-sale relationships with customers.
Leading market analysis, strategies, and action plans to drive CVUS sales.
Prospecting for new customers and growing the existing customer portfolio.
Achieving sales and revenue targets on an annual and quarterly basis.
Developing long-term customer relationships and identifying opportunities to satisfy customer needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors Degree & 3 years of experience; OR High School Diploma/GED & 5 years of experience; OR Bachelors Degree & a graduate of GE HealthCare CLP
